featured.text: 27 on the videos sit in bars, nightclubs, and roadhouses.

definition.zh_def: 路邊酒吧或餐廳，通常提供食物和飲料，並有現場音樂或娛樂。
definition.en_def: A roadside establishment that typically serves food and drinks, often featuring live music or entertainment.
definition.example: We stopped at a roadhouse for dinner on our way to the concert.
